branchCategory.name: 11-MXJ
branchCategory.description: The MXJ air slide table's integrated front mounting part and table result in a highly accurate, rigid top and front mounting surface. Clean specification styles are available with no dimensional changes.  Several options are available for both the standard and the clean series MXJ.  These options include a symmetric style, stroke adjusters, axial piping and auto switches.

branchItem.name: MXJ, Miniature Precision Slide Table (Linear Bearings)
branchItem.description: The MXJ air slide table's integrated front mounting part and table result in a highly accurate, rigid top and front mounting surface. Clean specification styles are available with no dimensional changes.  Several options are available for both the standard and the clean series MXJ.  These options include a symmetric style, stroke adjusters, axial piping and auto switches.
